I just watched a 20 minute teardown video of someone opening up a white Bal=
ly Arcade unit and showing the insides of it.  This video was uploaded to Y=
ouTube by "GameTechUS" on April 27, 2016, but I only noticed it today.

Thi=
s Bally unit was DOA, but he bought it for $40 (with free shipping) figurin=
g that it wouldn't work.  In the video "GameTechUS" opens the Bally Arcade =
and uses a thermal camera to look at the hot parts of the board (pretty nea=
t).  If you've never seen the inside of a Bally unit before, then this is a=
 good chance to take a close look at one.  I just watched this video on my =
big TV in the living and the quality of the video was quite impressive!

Yo=
u can watch the video here:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DzbWxUijM9Bc=


[https://www.bing.com/th?id=3DOVP.Ved0d0de4ba985724aacd65deb41d40df&pid=
=3DApi]<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DzbWxUijM9Bc>

RARE white Bally As=
trocade Astrovision - tear down thremal ...<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=
=3DzbWxUijM9Bc>
www.youtube.com
I scored a killer deal on a rare white ball=
y astrocade, i also take it apart and put the thermal cam on it! Be sure to=
 LIKE and SUBSCRIBE! It really helps! Visit my ...


It's a pretty cool vid=
eo, don't you think?


Adam

<p></p>
<div>I just wa=
tched a 20 minute teardown video of someone opening up a white Bally Arcade=
 unit and showing the insides of it.  This video was uploaded to YouTu=
be by "GameTechUS" on April 27, 2016, but I only noticed it today=
.<br>
<br>
This Bally unit was DOA, but he bought it for $40 (with free shi=
pping) figuring that it wouldn't work.  In the video "GameTechUS&=
quot; opens the Bally Arcade and uses a thermal camera to look at the hot p=
arts of the board (pretty neat).  If you've never seen the
 inside of =
a Bally unit before, then this is a good chance to take a close look at one=
.  I just watched this video on my big TV in the living and the qualit=
y of the video was quite impressive!<br>
<br>
